harmonizedMediumDesc: Outdoor ambient air
Human breast milk
Treated or untreated drinking water supplies, tap water, bottled drinking water, cooking water
Processed food products, including dairy products, breads, cooked meats, processed (e.g., canned or frozen) fruit and vegetable products, infant formula
Water from groundwater sources (wells, aquifers)
Human whole blood, blood cells, serum, plasma, or other extractants, including fetal or umbilical samples
Human tissues or fluids other than blood or urine, including nails, hair, semen, adipose tissue, saliva, sputum, sweat, amniotic, fluid, bone, and others
Residential or other indoor air samples
Residential or other indoor dust samples (from any location), including surface wipes
Landfill leachate (water having passed through landfill solids)
Unprocessed meat products or samples from non-fish animals to be used as food
Other ecological species not categorized elsewhere, including algae and seaweeds
Other environmental media, not classified elsewhere
Silicone wristband or other personal passive sampler
Personal air sample or exhaled breath
Snow, rainfall, or other atmospheric deposition
Non-food consumer products
Unprocessed raw fruits, vegetables, grains, nuts, or seeds that have been grown for food
Freshwater or marine sediments
Wipes from human skin (any body surface)
Sewage sludge
Soil, sand, or outdoor settled dust
Lake, river, or marine surface water; includes rainwater
Human urine
Terrestrial vegetation excluding non-processed fruits and vegetables
Inflow or outflow samples from municipal or industrial sites
Marine or freshwater invertebrates (e.g., crustaceans, mollusks etc.), any tissue
Non-fish aquatic vertebrates or mammals, any tissue
Avian species, any tissue (including eggs)
Fish species, any tissue
Terrestrial invertebrates, any tissue
Terrestrial vertebrates, any tissue
